channel.title: How to hack a friends computer... easy as!
channel.description:
kk this won't work on some computer's
step 1. On logon screen once the computer has started up press: ctrl + alt + del (del x2)
step 2. Do user as "administrator"
then if it worked you are on the Computer's admin account... test it on your computa and put on a password to the admin account so no one hacks you...
